name: LoginAfterRegister
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for admin login and issues the token

Request payload must contain the following fields:

USERNAME : STRING
PASSWORD : STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/admins/login

raw 
  {
    "username": "adminSW2KKpu3tHCfG9@unisolve.org",
    "password": "wHm6eGCL7uFOArs="
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"status":200,"status_type":"success","message":"Login Successful","count":1,"data":[{"user_id":258,"name":"adminSW2KKpu3tHCfG9@unisolve.org","full_name":"admin user","status":"ACTIVE","role":"ADMIN","token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Dlh-vWmw53Wy4zQ6q5jVGNbz0ah76jQ2PtPOa6qMcZ0","type":"Bearer","expire":"3d"}]}
